090600  **************************************************************************                               060426     090600
090700  *  Preparazione video01                                                                                  060426     090700
090800  **************************************************************************                               060426     090800
090900  *                                                                                                        060426     090900
091000  * Per eseguire questa routine impostare:                                                                 060426     091000
091100  *    £VxxOperation = 'Prepare'                                                                           060426     091100
091200  *    £VxxPrepare = combinazione di lettere 'T' 'C' 'S' 'P' per indicare                                  060426     091200
091300  *                  quali record impostare. 'C' pulirà anche il subfile.                                  060426     091300
091400  *                  *blank significa: Tutti.                                                              060426     091400
091500  *                                                                                                        060426     091500
091600  **************************************************************************                               060426     091600
091700  *                                                                                                        060426     091700

943900 c     CheckDate     begsr                                                                                 060516     943900
944000  **************************************************************************                               060516     944000
944100  *  Utility di controllo data                                                                             060516     944100
944200  **************************************************************************                               060516     944200
944300  *                                                                                                        060516     944300
944400  *   Prima di richiamare questa routine pulire la DS £Date e impostare il c                               060516     944400
944500  *   -  £UserDate / £User6Date per effettuare il controllo della data e ric                               060516     944500
944600  *                             £DateError = *on    --> Data formalmente err                               060516     944600
944700  *                             £DateError = *off   --> Data formalmente val                               060516     944700
944800  *                                                                                                        060516     944800
944900  **************************************************************************                               060516     944900
945000  *                                                                                                        060516     945000
945100  * Sistemo date utente (START) --------------------------------------------                               060516     945100
945200  *                                                                                                        060516     945200
945300 c                   select                                                                      B01       060516     945300
945400 c                   when          £UserDate <> 0                                                X01       060516     945400
945500 c                             and £User6Date = 0                                                X01       060516     945500
945600 c                   eval      £6DGg = £UDGg                                                      01       060516     945600
945700 c                   eval      £6DMm = £UDMm                                                      01       060516     945700
945800 c                   eval      £6DAa = £UDAaaa - %int(£UDAaaa / 100) * 100                        01       060516     945800
945900 c                   when          £User6Date <> 0                                               X01       060516     945900
946000 c                             and £UserDate = 0                                                 X01       060516     946000
946100 c                   eval      £UDGg = £6DGg                                                      01       060516     946100
946200 c                   eval      £UDMm = £6DMm                                                      01       060516     946200
946300 c                   if        £6DAa < 80                                                        B02 AE    130301     946300
946400 c                   eval      £UDAaaa = 2000 + £6DAa                                             02       060516     946400
946500 c                   else                                                                        X02       060516     946500
946600 c                   eval      £UDAaaa = 1900 + £6DAa                                             02       060516     946600
946700 c                   endif                                                                       E02       060516     946700
946800 c                   endsl                                                                       E01       060516     946800
946900  *                                                                                                        060516     946900
947000  * Sistemo date utente (END) ----------------------------------------------                               060516     947000
947100  *                                                                                                        060516     947100
947200  * Controllo data (START) -------------------------------------------------                               060516     947200
947300  *                                                                                                        060516     947300
947400 c                   clear                   STD012_                                                       060516     947400
947500 c                   eval      STD012_SHDTIN = £UserDate                                                   060516     947500
947600 c                   eval      STD012_SHFERD = '1'                                                         060516     947600
947700  *                                                                                                        060516     947700
947800 c                   call      'STD012'      PL_STD012                                                     060516     947800
947900  *                                                                                                        060516     947900
948000 c                   eval      £DateError = STD012_SHFERD = 'S'                                            060516     948000
948100  *                                                                                                        060516     948100
948200  * Controllo data (END) ---------------------------------------------------                               060516     948200
948300  *                                                                                                        060516     948300
948400  **************************************************************************                               060516     948400
948500 c                   endsr                                                                                 060516     948500
948700 c     RotateDate    begsr                                                                                 060512     948700
948800  **************************************************************************                               060512     948800
948900  *  Utility di rotazione data                                                                             060512     948900
949000  **************************************************************************                               060512     949000
949100  *                                                                                                        060512     949100
949200  *   Prima di richiamare questa routine pulire la DS £Date e impostare i ca                               060512     949200
949300  *   -  £UserDate / £User6Date per effettuare la rotazione da utente a sist                               060512     949300
949400  *                             £SystemDate                                                                060512     949400
949500  *   -  £SystemDate            per effettuare la rotazione da sistema a ute                               060512     949500
949600  *                             £UserDate e £User6Date                                                     060512     949600
949700  *                                                                                                        060512     949700
949800  **************************************************************************                               060512     949800
949900  *                                                                                                        060512     949900
950000  * Sistemo date utente (START) --------------------------------------------                               060512     950000
950100  *                                                                                                        060512     950100
950200 c                   select                                                                      B01       060512     950200
950300 c                   when          £UserDate <> 0                                                X01       060512     950300
950400 c                             and £User6Date = 0                                                X01       060512     950400
950500 c                   eval      £6DGg = £UDGg                                                      01       060512     950500
950600 c                   eval      £6DMm = £UDMm                                                      01       060512     950600
950700 c                   eval      £6DAa = £UDAaaa - %int(£UDAaaa / 100) * 100                        01       060512     950700
950800 c                   when          £User6Date <> 0                                               X01       060512     950800
950900 c                             and £UserDate = 0                                                 X01       060512     950900
951000 c                   eval      £UDGg = £6DGg                                                      01       060512     951000
951100 c                   eval      £UDMm = £6DMm                                                      01       060512     951100
951200 c                   if        £6DAa < 80                                                        B02 AE    130301     951200
951300 c                   eval      £UDAaaa = 2000 + £6DAa                                             02       060512     951300
951400 c                   else                                                                        X02       060512     951400
951500 c                   eval      £UDAaaa = 1900 + £6DAa                                             02       060512     951500
951600 c                   endif                                                                       E02       060512     951600
951700 c                   endsl                                                                       E01       060512     951700
951800  *                                                                                                        060512     951800
951900  * Sistemo date utente (END) ----------------------------------------------                               060512     951900
952000  *                                                                                                        060512     952000
952100  * Ruota data (START) -----------------------------------------------------                               060512     952100
952200  *                                                                                                        060512     952200
952300 c                   clear                   STD012_                                                       060512     952300
952400 c                   select                                                                      B01       060512     952400
952500 c                   when          £UserDate <> 0                                                X01       060512     952500
952600 c                             and £SystemDate = 0                                               X01       060512     952600
952700 c                   eval      STD012_SHDTIN = £UserDate                                          01       060512     952700
952800 c                   eval      STD012_SHFERD = '1'                                                01       060512     952800
952900 c                   when          £SystemDate <> 0                                              X01       060512     952900
953000 c                             and £UserDate = 0                                                 X01       060512     953000
953100 c                   eval      STD012_SHDTIN = £SystemDate                                        01       060512     953100
953200 c                   eval      STD012_SHFERD = '2'                                                01       060512     953200
953300 c                   other                                                                       X01       060512     953300
953400 c                   leavesr                                                                      01       060512     953400
953500 c                   endsl                                                                       E01       060512     953500
953600  *                                                                                                        060512     953600
953700 c                   call      'STD012'      PL_STD012                                                     060512     953700
953800  *                                                                                                        060512     953800
953900 c                   select                                                                      B01       060512     953900
954000 c                   when          £UserDate <> 0                                                X01       060512     954000
954100 c                             and £SystemDate = 0                                               X01       060512     954100
954200 c                   eval      £SystemDate = STD012_SHDTOU                                        01       060512     954200
954300 c                   when          £SystemDate <> 0                                              X01       060512     954300
954400 c                             and £UserDate = 0                                                 X01       060512     954400
954500 c                   eval      £UserDate = STD012_SHDTOU                                          01       060512     954500
954600 c                   eval      £6DGg   = £UDGg                                                    01       060512     954600
954700 c                   eval      £6DMm   = £UDMm                                                    01       060512     954700
954800 c                   eval      £6DAa   = £UDAaaa - %int(£UDAaaa / 100) * 100                      01       060512     954800
954900 c                   endsl                                                                       E01       060512     954900
955000  *                                                                                                        060512     955000
955100  * Ruota data (END) -------------------------------------------------------                               060512     955100
955200  *                                                                                                        060512     955200
955300  **************************************************************************                               060512     955300
955400 c                   endsr                                                                                 060512     955400
955600 c     *inzsr        begsr                                                                                 060426     955600

000001=OANAFID1R                                                                                                         116000001
        *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*                   116
        * Formato record RPG . . . . :  ANAFID1R                                                     *                   116
        * Formato esterno  . . . . . :  ANAFID1R : MODELL/ANAFID3L                                   *                   116
        * Formato testo. . . . . . . :  ANAGRAFICA FIDI                                              *                   116
        *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*                   116
000002=O                       FDTREC               3A CHAR        3              Cde Tipo Rec.File -AFD-      CMN       116000002
000003=O                       FDFLAG               4A CHAR        1              Sts Record V/A               CMN       116000003
000004=O                       FDNAZN               9P PACK      9,0              Nbr Azione Aggiornamento     CMN       116000004
000005=O                       FDLOCK              10A CHAR        1              Sts Blocco record            CMN       116000005
000006=O                       FDNREC              15P PACK      9,0              Nbr Relativo Record          CMN       116000006
000007=O                       FDDINS              21S ZONE      6,0              Dte Inserimento              CMN       116000007
000008=O                       FDDUPD              27S ZONE      6,0              Dte Aggiornamento            CMN       116000008
000009=O                       FDCODC              32S ZONE      5,0              Cde Cedente                  AC        116000009
000010=O                       FDCODF              36A CHAR        4              Cde Fido                     FD        116000010
000011=O                       FDDES1              96A CHAR       60              Nar Descrizione Fido         FD        116000011
000012=O                       FDDES2             156A CHAR       60              Nar Descrizione Fido         FD        116000012
000013=O                       FDDDLS             158S ZONE      2,0              Dte SS Delibera Fido         FD        116000013
000014=O                       FDDDLA             160S ZONE      2,0              Dte AA Delibera Fido         FD        116000014
000015=O                       FDDDLM             162S ZONE      2,0              Dte MM Delibera Fido         FD        116000015
000016=O                       FDDDLG             164S ZONE      2,0              Dte GG Delibera Fido         FD        116000016
000017=O                       FDDSCS             166S ZONE      2,0              Dte SS Scadenza Fido         FD        116000017
000018=O                       FDDSCA             168S ZONE      2,0              Dte AA Scadenza Fido         FD        116000018
000019=O                       FDDSCM             170S ZONE      2,0              Dte MM Scadenza Fido         FD        116000019
000020=O                       FDDSCG             172S ZONE      2,0              Dte GG Scadenza Fido         FD        116000020
000021=O                       FDDIV              175A CHAR        3              Cde Divisa                   MST       116000021
000022=O                       FDIMAN             180P PACK      9,0              Val Fido avvenuta Notifica   FD        116000022
000023=O                       FDIMAR             185P PACK      9,0              Val Fido avven.Riconoscimen. FD        116000023
000024=O                       FDORDL             187A CHAR        2              Cde Organo Deliberante       MST       116000024
000025=O                       FDDRVS             189S ZONE      2,0              Dte SS Revoca Fido           FD        116000025
000026=O                       FDDRVA             191S ZONE      2,0              Dte AA Revoca Fido           FD        116000026
000027=O                       FDDRVM             193S ZONE      2,0              Dte MM Revoca Fido           FD        116000027
000028=O                       FDDRVG             195S ZONE      2,0              Dte GG Revoca Fido           FD        116000028
000029=O                       FDOPER             196A CHAR        1              Sts Fido Operante N=No       FD        116000029
000030=O                       FDSTAT             197A CHAR        1              Cde Stato del Fido           MST       116000030
000031=O                       FDFIL              198A CHAR        1              Cde Filiale                  MST       116000031
000032=O                       FDSEO              199A CHAR        1              Cde Settore                  MST       116000032
000033=O                       FDCNTZ             200A CHAR        1              Cde Contenzioso              MST       116000033
000034=O                       FDRSRC             210A CHAR       10              Nar Ridotta Rag.Soc.Ced.     AC        116000034
000035=O                       FDWRK1             211A CHAR        1              Sts Pool 0/3/4               FD        116000035
000036=O                       FDWRK2             212A CHAR        1              Sts Ristrutturazione 0/9     FD        116000036
000037=O                       FDWRK3             213A CHAR        1              Sts Byte Work 03             FD        116000037
000038=O                       FDWRK4             214A CHAR        1              Sts Byte Work 04             FD        116000038
000039=O                       FDWRK5             215A CHAR        1              Sts Byte Work 05             FD        116000039
